pullrequest.title: Legacy/current behavior of model level composition

content.raw: This is how gazebo classic does it, but only because [gazebo::common::SystemPaths::UpdateModelPaths](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/src/13b71990d5449de589e4dcaa83dbc711394650ed/gazebo/common/SystemPaths.cc#lines-208) calls [sdf::addURIPath("model://", path)](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/src/c760f10bca16306d4fc3f0308a19f95f504c3412/include/sdf/SDFImpl.hh?at=default#lines-67:72) for each path listed in the `GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH` environment variable. We should probably describe how to use the libsdformat API, rather than just describe how osrf/gazebo works.
content.html: This is how gazebo classic does it, but only because gazebo::common::SystemPaths::UpdateModelPaths calls sdf::addURIPath("model://", path) for each path listed in the GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH environment variable. We should probably describe how to use the libsdformat API, rather than just describe how osrf/gazebo works.
